price: 145. Nabii Muusah tawraat lucwal madqooqik israa-iil xaylo kah ceyitti ittam kassis kee kulliimih baxxaqqa addal как tani nuktube, tokkel Muusaw tawraat kitab hirgitaay maqar luk Yallih taaqatal kaal ingicilliyaay ku mara diggi ittaah tayseemil kaak taamitaanamal ken amris, urna maray Yallih amrik yewqeh dabqi sin aybulleeyyo Akeeral kaak iyye Yalli.
arabic: وَكَتَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَلۡوَاحِ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مَّوۡعِظَةٗ وَتَفۡصِيلٗا لِّكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ فَخُذۡهَا بِقُوَّةٖ وَأۡمُرۡ قَوۡمَكَ يَأۡخُذُواْ بِأَحۡسَنِهَاۚ سَأُوْرِيكُمۡ دَارَ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wakatabnā lahu fī al-alwāḥi min kulli shayin mawʿiẓatan watafṣīlan likulli shayin fakhudh'hā biquwwatin wamur qawmaka yakhudhū bi-aḥsanihā sa-urīkum dāra al-fāsiqīna
